pageContext.claim: “[Democrats] even want to force states to implement the controversial practice known as 'ballot harvesting' -- a very dangerous practice -- meaning they would allow Democrat Party operatives to deposit thousands and thousands of completed ballots at the post office without any verification of who filled them out, including a verification of signatures on the ballots. ”
pageContext.analysis: Ballot harvesting is legal in many states. Political operatives from both sides routinely do it to ensure that voters who requested absentee ballots actually turn them in.
